Fitbit Analyzer

I built this project to create a sleep cycle analyzer from my Fitbit data. I am very interested in the change in sleep patterns across people, and I think there is a lot you can tell from someoneâ€™s sleep.

GraphQL Api

I am the author of the GraphQL-Api library on Github. I continue to develop this to make it easier to get started with GraphQL on rails.

Hive User Management App

One of my first projects for real people was building out a management system for the coworking space Hive Vancouver. I built out a simple application that let administrators manage the business.

Musefind

As a software developer at Musefind I have had an amazing opportunity to research graph databases and their impact on businesses like Musefind. For this my work was awarded financial reimbursement from SRED.

Raft Algorithm

Raft is a distributed consensus algorithm meant to keep a replicated log of commands sent to a client. These are my attempts at building my own working version.

Sudoku Builder

This sudoku solving algorithm I hope shows off my ability to build and design good data structures and algorithms. I hope to walk you through my thought process and design.
